course_description: Lectures and readings focus on the diversity, structure, and conservation of marine ecosystems, including experimental and analytic approaches to their study. Discussions of primary literature cover current topics such as biological invasions, disease, climate change, and marine protected areas.
schedule_location: MW 4pm-5:15pm in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5206, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: C. Keogh, Status: Closed
